briefdescription.para: Additional image mode to those in ADImageMode_t.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *installPath, int cameraSerial, int shamrockID, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: AndorCCD

briefdescription.para: Constructor for Andor driver; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to collect the detector data, and sets reasonable default values the parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver, and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
installPath
The path to the Andor directory containing the detector INI files, etc. This can be specified as an empty string ("") for new detectors that don't use the INI files on Windows, but must be a valid path on Linux.
cameraSerial
The serial number of the desired camera.
shamrockID
The index number of the Shamrock spectrograph, if installed. 0 is the first Shamrock in the system. Ignored if there are no Shamrocks.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
Free resources and closes the Andor library

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADBinX, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks.
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

Prints details about the detector in us if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
Controls the level of detail in the report.

briefdescription.para: Function to check the return status of Andor SDK library functions.

parameterdescription.para: The return status of the SDK function

simplesect.para: 0=success. Does not return in case of failure.

parameterdescription.para: An exception is thrown in case of failure.

briefdescription.para: Save a data frame using the Andor SDK file writing functions.
Driver for Andor CCD cameras using version 2 of their SDK; inherits from ADDriver class in ADCore.
